reviews.review: This game scares me my heart dropped 5 times while scuffed leather face walked passed me 12 times in a closet
Fantastic is all i have to say.
really fun game and there is a learning curve to it but one of the funnest games i have ever played

its so fun when you get tunnelled and camped. It makes me feel special and that i am wanted and i'm important. There is no better feeling then a Bubba camping you in the basement, its better then friday night dinner with my nan. download dbd guys, its so fun, come get your free emotional damage!

I am a 49 yo father, probably one of the oldest people playing this game. I am a single father to my son, who is 14 now. My son got this game for Christmas in 2021 from his uncle, so we installed it on his computer and he started playing. By the end of the week he had 24 hours on this game. This was horrible for me, as it was already hard for me to find ways to spend time with my son, as he is always out with his friends or just watching YouTube. So I decided to get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him. I loaded into the game, picked my character and started playing but I was stuck on what you where supposed to do. I asked my Son for help and he hosted a game for me to join. I loved it as it was the best time I had spent with my son since my wife had died. This game has ever since brought me and my son closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house together as well. This game reminded me that there's fun to be had in everything, and it has brought both me and my son many happy memories.

I spent hours and hours unlocking those teachable perks. the game dev made a new system to unlock those perks and they decided to take those perks away and give NOTHING in return. they gave more prestige to character already prestiged but since you have a lot of character to build up, you dont prestige early on. eaven if i spent millions of bloodpoints on a character ...i get no reward at all but hey, they increased the amount of point you can earn for like 15%? not worth the hundred hours i spent unlocking my teachable perks... dont play this game the game dev will ruin it for you. one way or an other.
I love this game because i hate myself and deserve punishment
Very addictive game! You can meet some amazing people through this game, and make loads of friends. I got hooked right away into playing this with my friends.
terrible game its become so bad the community is cancer and make the game awful with hook camping killers and survivors  who exploit. this game sucks ass even if it was free DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT

I was always a fan of games, where u have to play as a team. Unfortunatly the gameplay of many killers (tunneling the shit out of u) results in survivors not helping each other and let the hanged survivor die. 
The times, where you get a team that helps (as survivor) are so, that it would be easier to find a CS:GO match without cheaters. 
How do the developers react to this problem? That tunneling is not a reason to ban...
BUT If you want to survive alone, without any help, just a bored killer staring at u while u bleed out (of cours after u helped the other survivor, which led u die now), this is the perfect game for....
The developers are always eager to develop new killers...just not a new punish system.....Money still counts more than the community
